Package src.application.management

Class FileSystemManager

java.lang.Object
src.application.management.FileSystemManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileManagementInterface, VirtualDiskInspectionInterface
public class FileSystemManager extends Object implements FileManagementInterface, VirtualDiskInspectionInterface
FileSystemManager is the kernel of the application. It represents the manager itself, being responsible for handling command and manipulating a virtual disk.

    • run

      public void run() throws Exception
      run() is the mounting point of the file system manager, it initializes its workflow
      Throws:
      Exception - to be handled by the application class

      Parameters:
      command - is a Command object representing an operation and carrying its required data
      Throws:

      InvalidEntryException

    • searchDirectory

      private SNodeDir searchDirectory(String pathname) throws VirtualFileNotFoundException
      used for finding a directory in the disk
      Parameters:
      pathname - is a path for the wanted directory
      Returns:
      a SnodeDir object representing the directory
      Throws:
      VirtualFileNotFoundException - when virtual file is not found

    • searchDirArray

      private SNodeDir searchDirArray(SNodeDir dir, String[] directories) throws VirtualFileNotFoundException
      Searches a directory by searching its path steps recursively
      Parameters:
      dir - is where you are searching for a directory
      directories - is an array of directory names representing the subsequent steps in a previously given path
      Returns:
      a SnodeDir object representing the directory
      Throws:
      VirtualFileNotFoundException - when virtual file is not found

    • addDirectory

      public boolean addDirectory(String pathname, String filename) throws InvalidEntryException, VirtualFileNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: FileManagementInterface
      Metodo que adiciona nova entrada (diretorio) em um diretorio existente
      Specified by:
      addDirectory in interface FileManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      pathname - - caminho absoluto do diretorio alvo da operacao
      filename - - identificador do novo diretorio sendo criado
      Returns:
      true se operacao realizada com sucesso, false se operacao nao pode ser realizada
      Throws:
      InvalidEntryException - - se formato de pathname ou filename for invalido ou entrada for duplicada
      VirtualFileNotFoundException - - se diretorio identificado por pathname nao for encontrado

    • addFile

      public boolean addFile(String pathname, String filename, FileType type, int length) throws InvalidEntryException, VirtualFileNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: FileManagementInterface
      Metodo que adiciona nova entrada (arquivo) em um diretorio existente
      Specified by:
      addFile in interface FileManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      pathname - - caminho absoluto do diretorio alvo da operacao
      filename - - identificador do novo arquivo sendo criado
      Returns:
      true se operacao realizada com sucesso, false se operacao nao pode ser realizada
      Throws:
      InvalidEntryException - - se formato de pathname ou filename for invalido, entrada for duplicada, tipo de arquivo for invalido (diretorio) ou tamanho do arquivo for invalido
      VirtualFileNotFoundException - - se diretorio identificado por pathname nao for encontrado

      parseCommandFile in interface FileManagementInterface
      Parameters:
      pathname - - caminho do arquivo texto onde os comandos estao armazenados
      Returns:
      true se arquivo de comandos for encontrado e processado, false se arquivo de comandos nao for encontrado
